name: ARRaycastQuery.TargetAlignment
desc: A specification that indicates a target's alignment with respect to gravity.

items.name: case any
items.desc: The case that indicates a target may be aligned in any way with respect to gravity.

items.name: case horizontal
items.desc: The case that indicates a target is aligned horizontally with respect to gravity.

items.name: case vertical
items.desc: The case that indicates a target is aligned vertically with respect to gravity.
